pr_title: SO-4202: fix merge performance issue when merging huge amount of changes into a branch

timeline.message:
SO-4202: load commits in batches of 20 to reduce memory constraint...

...when comparing changes between to branches with large result sets

SO-4202: replace String.format with String.join...

...in ObjectId and RevisionCompareDetail to improve performance of
compare and merge processes.

SO-4202 #resolve

Fix merge performance issue when merging huge amount of changes from a
branch into another (speed up conflict detection).

timeline.bodyText: This is now a separator, not a String template. Please rename the constant
timeline.author: apeteri

timeline.bodyText: The property also has a @JsonIgnore annotation.
timeline.author: apeteri

timeline.bodyText: It no longer seems to be necessary to consume Map entries here 🤔 We're not doing anything with any leftover entries in sourcePropertyChanges (or indirectly via sourcePropertyChangesByObject).
timeline.author: apeteri
apeteri

timeline.message:
SO-4202: make property conflict detection algorithm more readable

Remove source,target prop change Maps from byObject Map before checking
for conflicts to slowly release allocated memory.
